an1.41:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, salisukam va yavasukam va micchapanihitam hatthena va padena va akkantam hattham va padam va bhecchati lohitam va uppadessatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an1.41:1.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu micchapanihitena cittena avijjam bhecchati, vijjam uppadessati, nibbanam sacchikarissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an1.42:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, salisukam va yavasukam va sammapanihitam hatthena va padena va akkantam hattham va padam va bhecchati lohitam va uppadessatiti thanametam vijjati.
an1.42:1.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu sammapanihitena cittena avijjam bhecchati, vijjam uppadessati, nibbanam sacchikarissatiti thanametam vijjati.
an1.43:1.1: “Idhaham, bhikkhave, ekaccam puggalam padutthacittam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
an1.43:1.2: ‘imamhi ce ayam samaye puggalo kalam kareyya, yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye’.
an1.43:1.5: Cetopadosahetu pana, bhikkhave, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti”ti.
an1.44:1.1: “Idhaham, bhikkhave, ekaccam puggalam pasannacittam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
an1.44:1.2: ‘imamhi ce ayam samaye puggalo kalam kareyya, yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge’.
an1.44:1.5: Cetopasadahetu pana, bhikkhave, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti.
an1.45:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, udakarahado avilo lulito kalalibhuto tattha cakkhuma puriso tire thito na passeyya sippisambukampi sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi titthantampi.
an1.45:1.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu avilena cittena attattham va nassati parattham va nassati ubhayattham va nassati uttarim va manussadhamma alamariyananadassanavisesam sacchikarissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
an1.46:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, udakarahado accho vippasanno anavilo tattha cakkhuma puriso tire thito passeyya sippisambukampi sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi titthantampi.
an1.46:1.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu anavilena cittena attattham va nassati parattham va nassati ubhayattham va nassati uttarim va manussadhamma alamariyananadassanavisesam sacchikarissatiti thanametam vijjati.
an1.47:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yani kanici rukkhajatanam phandano tesam aggamakkhayati yadidam mudutaya ceva kammannataya ca.
an1.47:1.2: Evamevam kho aham, bhikkhave, nannam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam bhavitam bahulikatam mudu ca hoti kammannanca yathayidam cittam.
an1.47:1.3: Cittam, bhikkhave, bhavitam bahulikatam mudu ca hoti kammannanca hoti”ti.
an1.48:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam lahuparivattam yathayidam cittam.
an1.48:1.2: Yavancidam, bhikkhave, upamapi na sukara yava lahuparivattam cittan”ti.
